entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Port Colborne
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this afternoon then sunny. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
